il.ac.telhai.coupons.model

Class Coupon

  • java.lang.Object
    • il.ac.telhai.coupons.model.Coupon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    @Entity
public class Coupon
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The Coupon class represents a coupon.

    A coupon has a name, unique identifier, description, and an image. It is mapped to the database using annotations.

    Author:
    Nahum and Eyal
    See Also:
    MySQLCouponsDAO, Serialized Form
